product_name: Spy Marshall Snow Goggles - Volume 11 Frame
long_description: With a spherical lens and a fog-combatting design, the mid-sized Spy Marshall Volume 11 snow goggles will help keep your sight lines clear as you crank it up on sunny days. Bronze lens has 11.7% visible light transmission (VLT) and a multilayer silver mirror finish to enhance definition and reduce eye fatigue on bright, sunny days. Spherical lens tapers from the optical center toward the periphery for a wide field of vision with minimal distortion. Double-layer thermal lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air next to your face, helping reduce fogging. Antifog and antiscratch lens treatments help keep your vision clear and distortion-free. Strategically placed frame vents increase airflow to reduce fogging; flexible polyurethane frame ensures a comfortable fit. 3-layer face foam is constructed of a dense base, a plush mid layer and a soft fleece top layer; design ensures a tight seal, good moisture management and maximum comfort. Wide adjustable strap is backed with silicone ribbing so it stays in place, whether you're wearing a helmet or not. The Spy Marshall snow goggles are designed to fit medium-sized faces.
short_description: With a spherical lens and a fog-combatting design, the mid-sized Spy Marshall Volume 11 snow goggles will help keep your sight lines clear as you crank it up on sunny days.
